title: Profitable E - Commerce Skateboard Retailer
text: Questions Business Summary Price just reduced and seller is motivated. This is a unique opportunity to acquire one of the largest skateboard online retailers with a fully integrated web based software POS and INV control system. Wide selection of product offerings from over 100 vendors with over 4,000 SKU's. Seller will consider financing for a qualified buyer and is willing to commit to a longer term training period to help ensure a smooth transition. Products are sold worldwide and there are thousands of repeat customers and nearly 7,000 club members. Asking price includes $50,000 in Inventory as well as a fully developed site for a skateboard manufacturer acquired by the company in 2014. Seller states there is potential to scale this business quickly and sales are currently over 95% web based with an average gross margin of 41%. Call immediately for more details on this exciting business opportunity. Asking Price: $350,000. Seller financing available:$250k DP; Balance SCN for 24 months at 6% interest. Financials
